product_name: MSR Gear Shed Vestibule for Hubba or Hubba Hubba Tent - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The MSR Gear Shed Vestibule adds increased livability to your MSR Hubba or Hubba Hubba Tent (sold separately). Hooped vestibule adds nearly 26 sq. ft. of space. Partial floor creates a clean place to store gear out of the way. Extends the versatility of your backpacking tent into a family or basecamp tent. Peak height is 35 in.; packed size 4.5 x 19 in. Closeout.
short_description: The MSR Gear Shed Vestibule adds increased livability to your MSR Hubba or Hubba Hubba Tent (sold separately).
